REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2491 reute r f BC-GOULD-<GLD>-COMPLETES 04-01 0070

TEXT.TITLE: GOULD <GLD> COMPLETES SALE OF DIVISION
TEXT.BODY: Gould Inc said it has completed the sale of its Systems and Simulations Division to the unit's management for an undisclosed price. Gould said the move is part of its plan to divest its defense systems businesses and focus on its computer and electronics sectors. Gould added that it accounted for the division as a discontinued operation. Reuter
